name: Ben's Sky Runner
description:
Ben's Sky Runner is my first published game available on Google Play. 

Can bears fly? No, but this one can. Polar bear Ben is the cutest and the coolest flying bear in the world!

Will you help guide this cute polar bear through the sky and join him on a fun adventure?

Ben found himself in a tough situation. It is too late to turn back, he is flying too fast and in a few seconds, he will be surrounded by nasty spikey creatures. 

Ben's Sky Runner was developed by an indie developer PreyCat9 and it adopts the gameplay of an infinite runner through the sky and it uses a polar bear named Ben as its main character.

The game is not easy so it is going to present a certain challenge to every player. Also, the difficulty progresses as time passes by.
